item.description:
10/01/11 -- Tickets have been purchased!

Rhode Island College is hosting this amazing international acrobatic troupe from the People's Republic of China.  Note that it is highly likely that this event will sell out.  I'm setting an RSVP deadline of September 30th so we have a shot at decent tickets.  The event is in Robert's Hall at Rhode Island College.  Here's their description of the performance:

Direct from Beijing, this troupe dazzles and amazes with stunning costumes, incredible balancing acts and fast-paced acrobatics. Fun for all ages!

Ticket Information

Tickets are $38.50. The breakdown is as follows:  Ticket - $35. Box Office Service Charge - $3.50.  

I will purchase all tickets on Saturday, October 1st.  If you wish to sit with us, I must have the cost of your ticket in-hand no later than Friday, September 30th.  If you miss that date, you're still welcome to attend, however you will likely not be seated with the group.

Ticket Payment Options

I haven't had much luck requiring payment with the RSVP, so I'll try something new this time around.  The only option for payment I cannot accept is a personal check.  Other than that, here are the choices:

1.  Send me your e-mail address and I will send you a Paypal Invoice.  Using that method, you may pay be credit card or direct debit, whichever you prefer.

2.  If you prefer, I will send you may address and you can mail me a money order, cashier's check, or any other form of secured payment.  Anything except a personal check is fine.

3.  If you are attending another meet-up before the deadline, you can pay in cash.

Remember, I must have all ticket money in hand by 09/30/11.

Ticket Refund Policy

If the show is sold out by 10/01/11, all money will be refunded in its entirety.  Once I have purchased tickets, however, there are no refunds possible.  Of course, you're encouraged to try to find a replacement if you're unable to make it.

Finding Us

You will receive an e-mail with my cell phone number the week prior to the show.  My cell phone will be on until we enter the theater.  If you are running late please call.  We will meet in the lobby of the theater by 7:00.
item.how_to_find_us: In the lobby of Robert's Hall
item.name: National Acrobats of the People's Republic of China
